titleStmt.title: The church-man and the Quaker dialoguing: with a reply to an answer to a late pamphlet, called, A sober dialogue between a Scotch Presbyterian, a London church-man, and a real Quaker

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: In part a reply to: A sober dialogue between a Scotch Presbyterian, a London church-man, and a real Quaker.
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
